Note: Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text tells the farmers ways to speed up the production of the crops inorder to feed the allies and and the people at home. No pictorial content.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Pa. : Pennsylvania Committee of Public Safety, Dept. of Food supply,
